TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataTemplate extends System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate

summary.span: 描述数据对象的可视结构。

span.span: Describes the visual structure of a data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 来指定数据对象的可视化。You use a to specify the visualization of your data objects. 将 （例如 ）绑定到整个集合时， 对象特别有用。 objects are particularly useful when you are binding an such as a to an entire collection. 如果没有特定说明， 将显示集合中对象的字符串表示形式。Without specific instructions, a displays the string representation of the objects in a collection. 在这种情况下，可以使用 来定义数据对象的外观。In that case, you can use a to define the appearance of your data objects. 的内容成为数据对象的可视化结构。The content of your becomes the visual structure of your data objects. 有关详细讨论，请参阅[数据模板化概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview)。For an in-depth discussion, see [Data Templating Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 内联。The following example shows how to create a inline. 指定每个数据项在 内显示为三个 元素。The specifies that each data item appears as three elements within a . 在此示例中，数据对象是一个名为 `Task`的类。In this example, the data object is a class called `Task`. 请注意，此模板中的每个 元素都绑定到 `Task` 类的属性。Note that each element in this template is bound to a property of the `Task` class. [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#Inline](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#inline)] 在 resources 节中定义一个 更常见，因此它可以是一个可重用对象，如下例所示：It is more common to define a in the resources section so it can be a reusable object, as in the following example: [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#R1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#r1)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#AsResource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#asresource)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#R2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#r2)] 现在可以将 `myTaskTemplate` 用作资源，如以下示例所示：Now you can use `myTaskTemplate` as a resource, as in the following example: [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#MyTaskTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#mytasktemplate)] 有关完整示例，请参阅[数据模板化示例简介](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/DataTemplatingIntro)。For the complete sample, see [Introduction to Data Templating Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/DataTemplatingIntro).

param.span: 如果模板专用于对象数据，则这是数据对象的类型名称。

summary.span: 使用指定的 属性初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要引用类的类型名称，请使用[X:Type 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension)。To refer to the Type name of the class, use the [x:Type Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension). 如果模板用于 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] 的数据，则这是表示数据的标记名称的字符串。If the template is intended for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data, this is the string that represents the tag name of the data.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataTemplateKey As Object
public: property System::Object ^ DataTemplateKey { System::Object ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the default key of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未在 中的 上设置 " [x：Key" 指令](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive)，则 用作键。If you do not set the [x:Key Directive](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive) on a that is in a , the is used as the key.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ DataType { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.DataType : obj with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置此 所针对的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type for which this is intended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与 类的 属性非常相似。This property is very similar to the property of the class. 如果在未指定 `x:Key`的情况下将此属性设置为数据类型，则 会自动应用到该类型的数据对象。When you set this property to the data type without specifying an `x:Key`, the gets applied automatically to data objects of that type. 请注意，当你执行此操作时，将隐式设置 `x:Key`。Note that when you do that the `x:Key` is set implicitly. 因此，如果将此 `x:Key` 值，则将重写隐式 `x:Key`，并且不会自动应用 。Therefore, if you assign this an `x:Key` value, you are overriding the implicit `x:Key` and the would not be applied automatically. 另请注意，如果将 绑定到 `Task` 对象的集合，则 不会自动使用 。Also note that if you are binding a to a collection of `Task` objects, the does not use the automatically. 这是因为 上的绑定需要更多的信息来区分你是要绑定到整个集合还是单个对象。This is because the binding on a needs more information to distinguish whether you want to bind to an entire collection or the individual objects. 如果 跟踪 类型的选择，则可以将 绑定的 属性设置为 "`/`"，以指示你对当前项感兴趣。If your is tracking the selection of an type, you can set the property of the binding to "`/`" to indicate that you are interested in the current item. 有关示例，请参阅[如何：绑定到集合并基于选择显示信息](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection)。For an example, see [How to: Bind to a Collection and Display Information Based on Selection](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection). 否则，需要通过设置 属性显式指定 。Otherwise, you need to specify the explicitly by setting the property. 当您具有不同类型的数据对象的 时， 属性特别有用。The property is particularly useful when you have a of different types of data objects. 如果此属性的目标是不在默认命名空间中的 XML 元素，则必须在元素名称之前加上命名空间或命名空间指示符。If this property targets an XML element that is not in the default namespace, you must precede the element name with the namespace or a namespace designator. 对于通过 LINQ for XML 公开的 XML，命名空间出现在大括号中，前面有一个大括号转义序列：For XML exposed through LINQ for XML, the namespace appears in braces, preceded by a brace escape sequence: ```xaml ``` 对于通过 XPath 公开的 XML，元素名称前面有一个通过 的实例建立的命名空间指示符：For XML exposed through XPath, the element name is preceded by a namespace designator established by an instance of : ```xaml ``` ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *typeName**typeName* 如果模板用于对象数据，则此属性包含数据对象的类型名称（以字符串形式）。If the template is intended for object data, this property contains the type name of the data object (as a string). 若要引用类的类型名称，请使用[X:Type 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension)。To refer to the type name of the class, use the [x:Type Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension). 如果模板用于 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] 数据，则此属性包含 XML 元素名称。If the template is intended for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data, this property contains the XML element name. 有关为 XML 元素指定非默认命名空间的详细信息，请参阅文档备注。See the documentation remarks for details about specifying a non-default namespace for the XML element.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Triggers As TriggerCollection
public: property System::Windows::TriggerCollection ^ Triggers { System::Windows::TriggerCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取触发器的集合，这些触发器根据一个或多个条件应用属性值或执行操作。

span.span: Gets a collection of triggers that apply property values or perform actions based on one or more conditions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要在数据模板中创建触发器，则触发器的资源库应设置数据模板范围内的属性。If you are creating triggers within a data template, the setters of the triggers should be setting properties that are within the scope of the data template. 否则，使用面向包含数据的类型的样式创建触发器可能更合适。Otherwise, it may be more suitable to create triggers using a style that targets the type that contains the data. 例如，如果要绑定 控件，则容器是 对象。For example, if you are binding a control, the containers are objects. 如果使用触发器来设置不在 范围内的属性，则可能更适合创建 样式，并在该样式中创建触发器。If you are using triggers to set properties that are not within the scope of the , then it may be more suitable to create a style and create triggers within that style. 有关详细信息，请参阅什么是在 System.windows.datatemplate> 中？[数据模板化概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview)。For more information, see What Belongs in a DataTemplate? in the [Data Templating Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview). > [!NOTE] > 仅可通过显示的集合语法在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 中设置此属性，或者通过访问集合对象并使用它的各种方法（如 Add）来设置此属性。This property can only be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] via the collection syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as Add. 用于访问集合对象本身的属性是只读的，集合本身是可读写的。The property to access the collection object itself is read-only, the collection itself is read-write. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *OneOrMoreTriggers**OneOrMoreTriggers* 零个或多个 对象。Zero or more objects. ## Examples 以下 演示了 属性的用法。The following demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-xaml[DataBindingLab#AuctionItemDataTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/DataBindingLabApp.xaml#auctionitemdatatemplate)] 有关完整示例，请参阅[数据绑定演示](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。For the complete sample, see [Data Binding Demo](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void ValidateTemplatedParent(class System.Windows.FrameworkElement templatedParent) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub ValidateTemplatedParent (templatedParent As FrameworkElement)

span.span: The element this template is applied to.

summary.span: 根据一组规则检查模板化父级。

span.span: Checks the templated parent against a set of rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用以下规则：The method uses the following rules: - `templatedParent` 必须为非 null 。The `templatedParent` must be a non-null . - 必须应用于 。The must be applied to a .
